name: Embriotic
description:
It is the year 2121, and living humans are no more,
all that remains are some incubated embryo's.

Two AI's are in a state of constant war,

one side, programmed to protect the embryos,  guarding them,
the other, self-aware, and in a mission to eradicate the human race,

 trying to destroy them.

This is a story about the war between machines, for the fate of Mankind.
